H0.text: What common substance has the chemical formula NaCl. Sodium Chloride

H1.text: What common substance has the chemical formula NaCl. Bleach

H2.text: What common substance has the chemical formula NaCl. Baking Soda

H3.text: What common substance has the chemical formula NaCl. Salt

A4.text: Sodium chloride , commonly known as table salt, is an ionic compound with the chemical formula NaCl, representing a 1:1 ratio of sodium and chloride ions.

A5.text: Sodium chloride , in its edible form, is commonly used as a condiment and food preservative.

A6.text: Salt is used in winter road maintenance.
